about_the_game:
Welcome to This Is Pool, a genre-defining cue sports simulation from the makers of Hustle Kings™ and Pure Pool. Rack ‘em up and take a shot at the world’s most immersive and beautifully detailed pool game featuring stunning photo-realistic graphics and true-to-life game physics that are right on cue.

Developed using all the power of VooFoo Studios’ updated and completely revamped world-class game and physics engine, This Is Pool will set new benchmarks for graphical fidelity and hyper-realistic gameplay in a breath-taking simulation that is set to redefine how good a cue sports game can look and play.
